desc: Number sets BitsPerPixel value

Shows extra debugging information

Shows frames per second
Display a summary of command line options

Runs a multiplayer game

Runs the game without any delays for graphic benchmarking
Exits once the scenario is over, without displaying dialog
Selects a non-standard algorithm to be used by the AI controller
Selects the controller for this side

Runs the game without the GUI

Selects a multiplayer scenario
Selects a faction of the current era for this side
